short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Using Hash function for generating password

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This tool ensures security by generating unique passwords using SHA256 without storing them on your machine or any server. It achieves this by using and combining the provided information for each login.
